name: safety net
description:
Safety Net is a game made in Ren'py, in honor of Leelah Alcorn, for #JamForLeelah

The game is currently in its first stage of development, with only one person to come out to at the moment, but will be continuously updated over time to add more paths and more people to talk to and come out to.

The game is meant to be positive and good, while also hopefully showing the potential stresses that come from coming out to people online.

As well as that, the game is meant to show the kindness of friends on the internet, when it comes to coming out as trans, and how kind and supportive people can be.

Although the world is harsh, I hope this game can help people to both learn, and maybe get a bit of courage along the way in their own paths and quests in life.

If anything in this game is problematic, please let me know and I will change it and hopefully make it better.

If you wish to donate money towards charities supporting people who are trans, you can buy the game here for $1 or pay what you want: http://jamforleelah-fc.itch.io/safety-net

The game will always be free on this account, though.
